One of the best shooters around. Comp is a blast.

This game got me through some really hard times. My grandmother was killed in a blimp accident and I needed something to put my mind at rest. When I first loaded this game up, I was so sad and I was about to kill myself. I joined a competitive lobby and instantly I was called the n-word and screamed at. I quit and tried to kill myself, but I survived. Now, 6000 hours later, I only use the P90 because I am of ungodly skill. I have 456 negev aces and a girlfriend. Thank you to monster for the sponsership, and thank you grandma for the oppurtunity of a lifetime.
